## ILaunchOptionsAllowlist.allowedOptions property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Set of launch option keys that the user has explicitly allowed. These bypass the default security restrictions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
allowedOptions: string[];
```
